alert.note: Alert for Calvert; St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 12 at 4:16AM EST until January 13 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 6 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...St. Marys and Calvert Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 6 AM EST Saturday, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 3.0 feet, yards are flooded on Saint George Island, and water will begin covering the road leading to the island, especially if there is wave action. At 3.0 feet, parking lots near Charles Street in Solomons begin to flood, with several inches of water covering low-lying portions of Charles Street and Williams Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides two to two and a half feet above normal. The high tide at Solomons Island is at 2:59 AM on Saturday. The high tide at Piney Point is at 3:18 AM on Saturday. The high tide at Coltons Point is at 3:54 AM on Saturday. The high tide at Chesapeake Beach is at 4:48 AM on Saturday. The high tide at Point Lookout is at 2:07 AM on Saturday. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. St Marys River at Straits Point MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 1.9 ft, Major 3.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 12/03 AM 2.4 0.8 1.2 0.5 None 12/02 PM 2.3 0.7 0.9 1.0 None 13/03 AM 3.2 1.6 1.9 3.0 Minor 13/02 PM 2.3 0.7 1.0 2.0 None 14/04 AM 1.7 0.1 0.4 1.0 None 14/03 PM 1.2 -0.4 -0.1 2.0 None Chesapeake Bay at North Beach MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.6 ft, Moderate 2.6 ft, Major 3.6 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 12/03 AM 1.6 0.2 1.1 0.5 None 12/05 PM 2.0 0.6 0.8 1.0 None 13/04 AM 2.9 1.5 2.3 2.0 None 13/06 PM 2.5 1.1 1.3 0.5 None 14/05 AM 1.2 -0.2 0.6 0.5 None 14/06 PM 1.2 -0.2 0.1 0.5 None Patuxent River at Solomons Island MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 12/03 AM 2.0 0.5 1.1 1.0 None 12/03 PM 2.3 0.8 1.1 1.0 None 13/03 AM 3.3 1.8 2.3 2.0 Minor 13/03 PM 2.4 0.9 1.2 1.0 None 14/03 AM 1.5 0.0 0.5 1.0 None 14/04 PM 1.2 -0.3 0.0 1.0 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
